entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early this evening. Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
